Why Choose Debatolearno?

Our platform combines structured learning with practical application to help you become a skilled debater and critical thinker.

Structured Learning

Progressive courses from beginner to advanced levels with comprehensive lesson plans and clear learning objectives.

Interactive Quizzes

Test your knowledge with engaging quizzes after every 4 lessons to ensure you master each concept.

Skill Certification

Earn certificates upon completion of advanced courses to showcase your debate and critical thinking skills.

Two Debate Systems

Learn both British Parliamentary and General Basic debate formats to become a versatile debater.

Progress Tracking

Monitor your learning journey with detailed progress tracking and achievement systems.

Completely Free

Access all features, courses, and certifications at no cost. Quality education should be accessible to everyone.

Choose Your Learning Path

Select the debate system that matches your goals and interests

British Parliamentary

Master the world's most popular competitive debate format. Learn advanced techniques including government/opposition dynamics, extension strategies, and Points of Information.

  • 4-person team format
  • Opening & Closing Half strategies
  • Advanced case building
  • Tournament preparation
Start BP Course

General Basic System

Build foundational debate skills with traditional argumentation techniques. Perfect for beginners and those interested in general critical thinking and persuasion skills.

  • Fundamental argumentation
  • Evidence-based reasoning
  • Cross-examination skills
  • Persuasion techniques
Start General Course
